messages.text: Make a demo video about nature

I can help with that! Here is a plan for your video.

Topic	Nature demo video
Audience	General audience
Music Theme	Calming and inspirational
Video Length	Approximately 15 seconds
Video Orientation	portrait
Script Plan	The script will be automatically generated based on the topic.
Target Language	English (United States)
Avatar	A female presenter in her 30s, with a friendly and engaging demeanor.
Voice	A warm and friendly adult female voice.
Supplemental Footage (B-roll)	Stock media of beautiful nature scenes.
Captions	Enabled

Would you like to proceed with this plan? Type Yes to continue with this plan.

Of course. Here is the updated plan with captions disabled.

Topic	Nature demo video
Audience	General audience
Music Theme	Calming and inspirational
Video Length	Approximately 15 seconds
Video Orientation	portrait
Script Plan	The script will be automatically generated based on the topic.
Target Language	English (United States)
Avatar	A female presenter in her 30s, with a friendly and engaging demeanor.
Voice	A warm and friendly adult female voice.
Supplemental Footage (B-roll)	Stock media of beautiful nature scenes.
Captions	Disabled

Would you like to proceed with this plan? Type Yes to continue with this plan.

Hello! I'm Video Agent, a helpful AI assistant from ArenaGen.

I can help you create a video. To get started, what would you like your video to be about?
Great! I will start generating your video. I will let you know once it is ready.
Now I want you to generate a video for Business consultancy

Hello! I'm Video Agent, a helpful AI assistant from ArenaGen. I can help you create a video about business consultancy.

Here is a plan for your video:

Topic	Business consultancy
Audience	Business professionals and entrepreneurs
Music Theme	Corporate and motivational
Video Length	Approximately 15 seconds
Video Orientation	portrait
Script Plan	The script will be automatically generated based on the topic.
Target Language	English (United States)
Avatar	A male presenter in his 40s, in business attire.
Voice	A clear and confident adult male voice.
Supplemental Footage (B-roll)	Stock media of business meetings and office environments.
Captions	Enabled

Would you like to proceed with this plan? Type Yes to continue with this plan.
I've just generated the video for you. Let me know what you think! If you'd like any changes, just tell me what they are.
